author: IGN
description: Check out the 'Shattered Veil' Season 3 Zombies Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, the latest addition of the hit first-person shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. Players will soon be able to access a brand new Zombies map as part of Season 3 called Shattered Veil, an overrun mansion full of secrets and history to uncover. Shattered Veil is launching on April 2 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Zombies - Official 'Shattered Veil' Season 3 Trailer

author: IGN
description: Backyard Baseball ‘97 is now available for iOS and Android. Check out the Backyard Baseball ‘97 mobile launch trailer for this re-release in the famed Backyard Sports series. Pablo Sanchez and his friends are back with fully optimized controls and enhanced mobile gameplay.
title: Backyard Baseball '97 - Official Mobile Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
King Sigismund's got trouble brewing - and it's not just Henry. Meet The Devil's Pack in this latest Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 trailer for the action RPG, and learn about this band of misfits, rogues, and unlikely heroes who aren't afraid to ruffle a few royal feathers. Henry wasn't meant to be a warrior, but fate had other plans. Lucky for him, he's not alone. 

Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 is available now on PC, Xbox Series X|S, and PS5 (PlayStation 5).
title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - Official The Devil’s Pack Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Charlie Brooker's dark, satirical anthology series returns with six brand new episodes, including a sequel to the sci-fi adventure USS Callister. Season 7's cast includes Cristin Milioti, Paul Giamatti, Awkwafina, Issa Rae, Will Poulter, Emma Corrin, Rashida Jones, Tracee Ellis Ross, and Peter Capaldi.

Black Mirror, Season 7 launches on Netflix on April 10, 2025.
title: Black Mirror Season 7 - Official Trailer (2025) Cristin Milioti, Issa Rae, Peter Capaldi

author: IGN
description:
Tune in on Wednesday, April 2, 2025 for IGN's Nintendo Direct Watch Party at 6am PT / 9am ET! Nintendo will be sharing more details and reveals for the Switch 2, and IGN will have a live-reaction NVC post-show that you won't want to miss.

#IGN #Nintendo #NintendoSwitch2 #NintendoDirect
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Direct: Live Watch Party and NVC Post Show

author: IGN
description: Watch the latest Path of Exile 2 trailer to see what's coming with the Dawn of the Hunt content update, which brings the new Huntress class, a dexterous Spear and Buckler user specializing in hybrid melee and ranged combat; five new ascension classes for the Ritualist, Amazon, Smith of Kitava, Tactician, and Lich; 25 new skills; new encounters in the endgame along with significant mechanical overhauls; and over 100 new unique items to the action RPG. Path of Exile 2's Dawn of the Hunt update launches on April 4, 2025 (12PM PDT).
title: Path of Exile 2: Dawn of the Hunt - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The final chapter of Atoraxxion: Orzekea will be available in Black Desert today, March 27, 2025. Check out the latest Black Desert cinematic trailer to see what to expect with the Atoraxxion: Orzekea, which is the fourth and final dungeon of Black Desert’s first act and the latest installment in its Atoraxxion co-op challenges. Atoraxxion: Orzekea introduces regular monster zones and delves into the story of Rux, the Great Architect, and his apprentices, the Dehkimas, each responsible for a unique biome. The new trailer gives us a peek at the battles that await in the corrupted biome of Orze, a Dehkima consumed by dark forces.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Black Desert - Official Atoraxxion: Orzekea - The Final Chapter Trailer

author: IGN
description: Nintendo just dropped a surprise final Nintendo Direct for the Switch 1, and it was packed with announcements! From a stunning new look at Metroid Prime 4: Beyond to long-awaited sequels like Rhythm Heaven: Groove and Tomodachi Life: Living the Dream, this Direct had something for everyone. Plus, Nintendo revealed a new smartphone app (Nintendo Today), Virtual Game Cards for sharing digital games between Switch and Switch 2, and surprise remasters like Dragon Quest 1+2 HD-2D and SaGa Frontier 2 Remastered.
title: Everything Announced at the Switch 1 Nintendo Direct

author: IGN
description: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers' movesets are intricate and interesting, its RPG mechanics seem deep and offer a lot of freedom, and the boss fights gave us a serious run for our money – and that’s rare these days. All that’s already got us pretty excited to play more.
title: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers – The First Hands-on Preview

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Assassin's Creed Shadows Ally Overview Trailer for the open-world action RPG developed by Ubisoft. Players can get the rundown on the Ally system in the game that allows players to meet, recruit, and even romance allies they meet throughout the journey. Assassin's Creed Shadows is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, macOS, and PC (Steam).

#AssassinsCreed #AssassinsCreedShadows #Gaming
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows - Official Ally Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out The First Berserker: Khazan launch trailer for the action RPG based on the DNF (Dungeon & Fighter) Universe. The First Berserker: Khazan is available now on PC via Steam, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S.

#IGN #Gaming
title: The First Berserker: Khazan - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out mech action in the Super Robot Wars Y announcement trailer for the upcoming tactical RPG. The sequel brings together iconic mecha characters and units from series including Combattler V, Aura Battler Dunbine, Mobile Fighter G Gundam, Mobile Suit Gundam the Witch from Mercury (Season 1), Majestic Prince, Macross Delta: Passionate Walküre, Code Geass Lelouch of the Re;surrection, Getter Robo Arc, and more.

Super Robot Wars Y will launch in 2025 for PS5 (PlayStation 5), Nintendo Switch, and PC via Steam.
title: Super Robot Wars Y - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
ALARA Prime brings a new spin to the tactical shooter genre. Instead of two teams, the upcoming game from Fall Damange sees three teams of four duke it out in tight corridors and lanes, using helpful gadgets to control the map. One team defends an objective while the other two try to steal it while outthinking and outplaying each other in their race to the MacGuffin in the middle.

#IGN #Gaming
title: ALARA Prime Hands-On Preview

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest GreedFall 2: The Dying World trailer for this narrative RPG to see what to expect with the new update, which brings a new region called Olima, nicknamed the City of Stars in reference to the gigantic observatory overlooking it. The update also introduces a new companion named Safia, a veteran explorer and firearms expert endowed with great wisdom. The update also includes the first companion quests, new weapons, new skills, improvements to the combat system (balancing, fluidity, interface, etc.), various fixes, and more. GreedFall 2: The Dying World is available now in Steam Early Access, and will launch on PS5 (PlayStation 5) and Xbox Series X|S later, when the game fully comes out of early access.

#IGN #Gaming
title: GreedFall 2: The Dying World - Official First Major Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here are the Avengers connections hidden in Marvel's Avengers: Doomsday cast tease! A lot has changed in the MCU since the events of Avengers: Endgame, including the fact that there isn’t actually an Avengers team anymore. New heroes have been rising up to fill the void left by Iron Man and Captain America, but it’s going to be a while before we get a proper Avengers movie again. Even Captain America: Brave New World stops short of reuniting Earth's Mightiest heroes.
Only at the end of Phase 6, when Marvel delivers the one-two-punch of Avengers: Doomsday in 2026 and Avengers: Secret Wars in 2027, will we see Earth’s Mightiest Heroes reunited. Who will answer the call? Now we know, with Marvel revealing the full Doomsday cast on a livestream.
Who made the cut in Marvel's newest Avengers lineup? More importantly, why are these characters being included? How does this roster build on the Multiverse Saga so far? Here’s the cast of characters you can expect to assemble in Phase 6.

Avenge
title: The Avengers Connections Hidden in Marvel's Doomsday Cast Tease

author: IGN
description:
Teeth gnash, grinding and gorging until nothing is left. A black and scarlet eye blazes above a grotesque grin. The screams turn to gurgles as his victims plead for mercy that will never come. Check out the Dead by Daylight x Tokyo Ghoul trailer for this upcoming collaboration. The Dead by Daylight x Tokyo Ghoul event will be available on March 11, 2025. Tokyo Ghoul's protagonist Ken Kaneki is revealed in a new role as a killer in the Dead by Daylight universe. 

Ken’s tragic fate is twisted into a deeper nightmare, allowing players to hunt their victims using his Kagune tentacles and unique perks to stalk fleeing survivors. The update will also add several new looks for pre-existing characters based on Tokyo Ghoul’s intriguing cast of characters and killers
title: Dead by Daylight x Tokyo Ghoul - Official Crossover Trailer

author: IGN
description:
See Lune in action in this latest Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 trailer for the upcoming RPG. Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, Epic Games Store, and Steam on April 24, 2025. 

Meet Lune, the passionate Scholar and Mage. The daughter of prominent researchers, Lune has a deep thirst for knowledge and has sacrificed everything to complete her parents’ work. Her one goal is to unravel the mystery of the Paintress. Entrusted with charting a path for the Expedition, Lune feels keenly the weight of responsibility and the stakes involved. She cannot - and will not - allow the Expedition to fail.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Official Lune Character Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Release Date Trailer for The Wandering Village, a city-building RPG developed by Stray Fawn Studio. Players will build a settlement and form a symbiotic relationship with the colossus in this city-building strategy game. The Wandering Village is launching on Nintendo Switch on July 17.

#TheWanderingVillage #Gaming #IGN
title: The Wandering Village - Official Release Date Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
InZOI lets you create and customize a city full of characters as they play out their simulated lives. With the world at your fingertips, there are plenty of features to dive into, which can be overwhelming. We're here to help – this video is a Beginner's Guide for how to play inZOI, including how to get started with your first family, tips to keep Zois alive, and ways to see them thrive.

0:00 Intro
0:33 Create Your First inZOI Family
2:37 Zoi Card: Desired Life, Ambitions, Urges, and Preferences
3:33 Relationships
4:17 Get a Job and Make Money
5:36 How to Keep Your Zois Alive
6:45 What Happens If Your Zoi Dies
7:12 Create Your Dream Home
7:54 Edit the World
10:04 More inZOI Tips

For more inZOI tips and tricks, check out our growing Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/inzoi/

#IGN #Gaming
title: InZOI - How to Get Started (Beginner's Guide)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Gameplay Trailer for Star Overdrive, an action-adventure game developed by Dear Villagers. Players will embark on a daring adventure through an alien world, uncovering secrets hidden in its depths. Star Overdrive is coming to Nintendo Switch on April 10 with a demo available now.

#StarOverdrive #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Star Overdrive - Official Gameplay Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the trailer for Gradius Origins, a collection of six classic side-scrolling shooters developed by Konami. Pilot your ship through dangerous enemy lines, upgrade your weapons, and master this intense, fast-paced adventure. Gradius Origins is launching on August 7 for Nintendo Switch.

#Nintendo #Gaming
title: Gradius Origins - Official Announcement Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at gameplay and more from Rift of the NecroDancer in this trailer for the rhythm game where the music fights back. The Celeste Music Pack paid DLC for Rift of the NecroDancer features four tracks from Lena Raine and a free dannyBstyle remix of Resurrections. Rift of the NecroDancer is available now on Nintendo Switch and Steam.

#RiftOfTheNecroDancer #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Rift of the NecroDancer & Celeste Music Pack - Official Launch Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
The beloved mobile puzzle games in the Monument Valley trilogy are heading to Nintendo Switch. Embark on a journey of forgiveness through impossible environments and illusionary puzzles. Check out gameplay here for Monument Valley 1 and Monument Valley 2, coming to Nintendo Switch on April 15 with Monument Valley 3 launching in Summer 2025 for Nintendo Switch.

#Nintendo #MonumentValley #Gaming
title: Monument Valley 1, 2 and 3 - Official Nintendo Switch Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
A new entry into the Everybody's Golf series is heading to Nintendo Switch and Steam. Everybody's Golf Hot Shots is coming in 2025. Take a look at newly revealed gameplay here!

#EverybodysGolf #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Everybody's Golf: Hot Shots - Official Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
Explore the whimsical world of Witchbrook in a look at gameplay from the witch town sim. Make friends, find love, and discover a world filled with wonder and charm on the road to graduation and beyond. Witchbrook is coming in Winter 2025 for Nintendo Switch, Xbox, and PC.

#Nintendo #Gaming
title: Witchbrook - Official First Look Gameplay Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
The first new Tomodachi Life in over 10 years is heading to Nintendo Switch as Miis gather on a resort island to have fun with each other. Check out a first look at gameplay here! Tomodachi Life: Living the Dream is coming to Nintendo Switch in 2026.

#TomodachiLife #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Tomodachi Life: Living the Dream - Official Reveal Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
Help out the stores in help in Tamagotchi Plaza! Take a look at new gameplay and all of the new and classic creatures you'll meet. Explore a whimsical world of Wonder Shops with over 100 Tamagotchi to play with. Tamagotchi Plaza is launching on June 27 for Nintendo Switch.

#Tamagotchi #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Tamagotchi Plaza - Official Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
Nintendo Today is a new phone app coming from Nintendo to deliver you the daily news you need to know about. The Nintendo Today app is launching on March 27 for iOS and Android.

#Nintendo #Gaming
title: Nintendo Today - Official Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
A sequel to the Fantasy Life 3DS game is here! Take a look at new gameplay from this upcoming time-traveling adventure. Fantasy Life i: The Girl Who Steals Time will be available on May 21, 2025.

#Nintendo #Gaming #Games
title: Fantasy Life i: The Girl Who Steals Time - Official Release Date Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
Rhythm Heaven is back! Get a new look at the new entry Rhythm Heaven: Groove in this gameplay trailer. Rhythm Heaven: Groove will be available on Nintendo Switch in 2026.

#RhythmHeaven #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Rhythm Heaven: Groove - Official Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
Comedy shooter High on Life is heading to Nintendo Switch. Travel to a variety of biomes and locations across the cosmos, go up against the nefarious Garmantuous and his gang of goons, collect loot, meet unique characters, and more. Check out a look at gameplay here of High on Life launching on May 6 for Nintendo Switch.

#HighOnLife #Gaming #Nintendo
title: High on Life - Official Nintendo Switch Release Date Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
The classic RPG Saga Frontier 2 is getting a fresh coat of paint, as well as new content, and is out on Nintendo Switch now.

#Nintendo #Gaming #SagaFrontier2
title: Saga Frontier 2 Remastered - Official Launch Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
Marvel Cosmic Invasion is a new game in the classic brawler style coming from DotEmu. Nova, Spider-Man, Wolverine, Phyla-Vell, Captain America, and many more heroes, both earth-born and cosmic, will join forces in a star-spanning brawling adventure against the deadly Annihilation Wave. Marvel Cosmic Invasion coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox, and PC (Steam) in 2025.

#Gaming #Marvel #Nintendo
title: Marvel Cosmic Invasion - Official Announcement Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
Nintendo is switching up the way digital games work on Switch. Learn how sharing virtual game cards across multiple Nintendo Switch and Switch 2 consoles works.

#Nintendo #Gaming
title: Nintendo Virtual Game Card - Official Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
A new look at Lumiose City is here in the Pokemon Legends Z-A gameplay trailer. Take a look at how the world changes at night and the Z-A Royale commences.

#Pokemon #Nintendo #Gaming
title: Pokemon Legends Z-A - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
Uncovers the secrets of the archipelago in the magical adventure Metroidvania, The Eternal Life of Goldman. The Eternal Life of Goldman is launching soon for Nintendo Switch.

#Nintendo #Gaming #Games
title: The Eternal Life of Goldman - Official Extended Gameplay Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar, originally called Harvest Moon: Grand Bazaar on the Nintendo DS, is coming to Switch. Take a look at fresh new gameplay here!

#Nintendo #Gaming #Games
title: Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar - Official Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
A new look at Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is here! An in-depth look at Metroid Prime 4 gameplay follows Samus on a new alien planet as we take a peek at her new powers. Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is launching in 2025 for Nintendo Switch.

#MetroidPrime4 #Nintendo #Gaming
title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a new look at gameplay from the upcoming Pac-Man metroidvania, Shadow Labyrinth, based loosely on the Amazon Secret Level episode. Shadow Labyrinth is launching on July 18 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#PacMan #Nintendo #Gaming
title: Shadow Labyrinth - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
Uncover the truth hidden in reality and in dreams. Join Special Agent Kaname Date on the case to discover the whereabouts of internet idol Iris, who has been trapped in a mysterious escape game. No Sleep for Kaname Date - From AI: Somnium Files is launching on July 25 for Nintendo Switch.

#Nintendo #Gaming
title: No Sleep for Kaname Date - From AI: Somnium Files - Official Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
Remasters of the original two Patapon games are on their way to Nintendo Switch! Take a look at new gameplay here. Patapon 1 + Patapon 2 Replay will be available on July 11, 2025.

#Nintendo #Patapon #Gaming
title: Patapon 1 + Patapon 2 Replay - Official Announcement Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a new look at gameplay from the upcoming Dragon Quest 1 and 2 HD remakes. Dragon Quest 1 & 2 HD Remake is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#Nintendo #DragonQuest #Gaming
title: Dragon Quest 1 & 2 HD Remake - Official Teaser Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2025

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from Podcast Beyond 888, Jada, Akeem, and Brian talk all about Bloodborne's 10th which Brian gets nostalgic for. Unfortunatly it doesnt look like Sony has any plans for a Bloodborne remaster/remake/60fps patch/anything in celebration of the game releasing 10 years ago. Can you believe its been 10 years? I feel old now. What are your thoughts on Sony skipping Bloodbornes birthday again?

This week’s show is Jada Griffin, Akeem Lawanson, Brian Altano, and is produced by Nick Maillet
Beyond! is a part of Geek Media Podcast Network, an IGN Entertainment Brand.

#IGN #Gaming #PS5
title: Dear PlayStation, Please Do Something With Bloodborne - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
We bet you didn't have a game like this on your BINGO card for this week. Check out the announcement trailer for Equinox: Homecoming – it'll take you on quite a ride (no pun intended). As the team at Blue Scarab (made up former Helldivers 2, Battlefield, World of Warcraft, and Star Stable developers) describes it, "Equinox is an open world MMORPG for fans of murder mysteries, cozy escapism, and horses! Saddle up and charge into a mysterious adventure. Every trail leads to wonder and intrigue while uncovering an occult murder mystery." You can wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3258290/Equinox_Homecoming/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Equinox: Homecoming – Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch this early concept trailer for Outpost 2: Orbital Siege (provisional) for this upcoming FPS, real-time strategy, and tower defense game. Outpost 2: Orbital Siege (provisional) features changes like mobile fortress revolution, evolving from static towers to a movable battleship/fortress equipped with drones for autonomous resource harvesting and item collection. In the sequel, fight against divine mega-construct bosses while surviving waves of 10,000+ enemies in sprawling battles.
title: Outpost 2: Orbital Siege (provisional) - Official Early Concept Trailer
